meanings.sent1: She abnegated her dessert to save room for the main course.
meanings.sent2: He always abnegated his own desires to help others.
meanings.sent3: The cat abnegated the temptation of the dangling toy to nap peacefully.
meanings.sent4: The student abnegated the easy route and chose the challenging path to learn more.
meanings.sent5: The athlete abnegated rest to train harder for the upcoming competition.

meanings.sent1: The committee abnegated the proposal due to lack of evidence.
meanings.sent2: She abnegated the job offer in favor of pursuing her passion.
meanings.sent3: The dog abnegated the unfamiliar treat, sticking to its favorite bone instead.
meanings.sent4: The artist abnegated traditional techniques to explore a new style of painting.
meanings.sent5: The explorer abnegated the known path, venturing into uncharted territory.
